entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:46 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with rain changing to rain or drizzle this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
